question: Who among the following reclaimed the top spot in the latest ICC ODI rankings for batsmen?
explanation: India captain Virat Kohli tops in the latest ICC ODI rankings for batsmen following the conclusion of the last round of league matches in the Champions Trophy. Kohli had entered the tournament 22 points behind number-one ranked AB de Villiers of South Africa, who had been No.1 since 25 February this year, and 19 points behind Australia's David Warner.
